trimText

public static java.lang.String trimText(java.lang.String aText)
Trims text lines within the given string. Lines are substrings delimited by newline characters. E.g. argument " One \n Two \n \nThree " yields "One\nTwo\n\nThree".

Parameters:
aText - the string to be trimmed.
Returns:
String a new trimmed string object.

normalizeText

public static java.lang.String normalizeText(java.lang.String aText)
Returns a "normalized" text string by removing single or repeative occurances of newlines (\n and \r\n) and tabs (\t) with a single white space. The leading and trailing spaces are also trimmed. The returned string is a single line string even if the input was multi-line.

Parameters:
aText -
Returns:
Returns the "normalized" text, in a single line.

getMessageDigest

public static byte[] getMessageDigest(java.io.InputStream aInput)
Takes an input stream for a file and returns the MD5 message digest which represents it. This value can be used to facilitate file comparisons. Note this method will return null if there is an error obtaining the MD5 code.

Parameters:
aInput - the stream to obtain the message digest for

findOnClasspath

public static java.net.URL findOnClasspath(java.lang.String aResourceName,
                                           java.lang.Class aClass)
Locate resources on the classpath. If a thread context classloader is set it will try to load the resource through it. If it can't and a non-null class is passed it will attempt to use its classloader to load the resource.

Parameters:
aResourceName -
aClass -
Returns:
The resource URL or null if the resource could not be located.

replacePropertyVars

public static java.lang.String replacePropertyVars(java.lang.String aPattern,
                                                   java.util.Map aProperties)
Utility method to perform substitution of environment variables within a given string. The substitution variable(s) should be in the format of ${VAR_TO_BE_REPLACED}. There may be multiple substition variables in an input pattern, but they may not be nested within each other. The caller may optionally supply the Properties to be used for substitution in addition to the System Properties. User properties take precedence over System properties. The user may "escape" a "$" character by preceding it with another "$" character.

Parameters:
aPattern - the string containing environment variables to be replaced with system property values
aProperties - an optional set of properties to be used in prior to using System properties during substitution, if null System properties will be used
Returns:
a new string with substitution variables replaced with their proper environment variables, if a replacement cannot be found, the substitution variable will be left intact.

getTempFile

public static java.io.File getTempFile(java.lang.String aPrefix,
                                       java.lang.String aSuffix)
                                throws AeException
This method creates a temporary file. In addition, it will throw nicely formatted AeExceptions if the temp directory does not exist or is not writable.

getShortNameForLocation

public static java.lang.String getShortNameForLocation(java.lang.String aLocation)
Return the short name of the passed url. Essentially by stripping off any preceeding path information from the passed location. TODO (cck) is this the same as getFileName, also we should handle urn format

Parameters:
aLocation - the location to get a short name for.

getNewUUID

public static java.lang.String getNewUUID()
Generates a new UUID based on a Hex encoded SHA digest of:
  1. unique id of this VM
  2. time in millis
  3. Cryptographically strong random number

Returns:
Formatted UUID URI
